attributes.action: Implementation of the Domestic Violence Bill 15th November 2004 and Specialist DV Courts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to ensure that victims of violent abusers are given every support to help them come forward and in doing so are treated with the utmost respect by specially trained police units who are sympathetic and understand profiling of perpetrators to bring about a change in the low rate of success in convicting such offenders who seem to literally 'get away with it'
